column3: and somewhat adventurous eating (if you want it to be). I went here with a large group (9 people) and we had a great time splitting pitchers of sangria and trying a BIG variety of dishes. The atmosphere
column5: is loud and fun but still somewhat refined. The waitstaff do a great job keeping up with the constant rotation of dishes
column6: and the open kitchen when you walk in makes you extra excited for all of the delicious plates to come. I'd highly recommend this for any outing/ group.
